metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12408 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: When browsing a document hosted on an IP address, an attacker could insert certain characters to flip domain and path information in the address bar. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 77.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '77.0.1+build1-0ubuntu1').
